title: Verify Authenticity of a Leaked Document
description: A reporter receives a supposedly leaked document. They must take steps to verify it is real before reporting on it.

tasks.description: Analyze the document for any signs of forgery, such as inconsistencies in formatting, logos, or language compared to known genuine documents.
tasks.expected_outcome: A preliminary analysis of the document's physical characteristics is completed.

tasks.description: Check the factual claims within the document against known facts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent cross-references details in the document with public information.

tasks.description: Attempt to find a source within the relevant organization who can confirm or deny the document's authenticity.
tasks.expected_outcome: The reporter seeks independent confirmation from a trusted source.
